I got my first T210 from REA and would like to add a few more. I've lived in West Virginia and my wife is from eastern Kentucky so I'd like to add a few series 4 and 6.

Prefer low grade with no creases through the player. Graded or ungraded accepted.

Please PM or email, [url]shernan30@gmail.com[/url], with scans and asking price

Steven

Bump for edit to only series 4 & 6. Any out there available.
